resources.string:
Welcome to the Fuffle Collaboration. 


Please select the option appropriate to you:




If you are a registered admin please swipe right.



If you are a registered user or would like to join please swipe left to access the Fluffle Collaboration.
App Logo To Represent Home Page
This is your main menu, from here you can edit your details, search products and enter the Fluffle Community.\nYou can return to this menu at any time by selecting the logo image seen below.

Here you can search through all the products we have details on.
Once you find what your looking for you can click on the products name to see more details.
You can also see reviews people have left for that product or leave your own.
****We are still growing our range of products so if you can't find what your looking, check back again soon. Or why not post in the Fluffle Community and see if any of our other member can help you out.****

Welcome to the community section of the Fluffle Collaboration.
Need advice??
Maybe you have a wealth of knowledge you'd like to share.
Here you can interact with other members of the community. You can view posts and reply to them, or even create a post of your own. 
HOP TO IT!!!!
